thread.title: GoMarketing Inc. the Launch of the Kohl Building Maintenance Website
thread.title_full: GoMarketing Inc. Announces the Launch of the New Kohl Building Maintenance Website

author: Richard Uzelac
title: GoMarketing Inc. the Launch of the Kohl Building Maintenance Website
text:
GoMarketing Inc. an online Marketing and Advertising agency in Thousand Oaks, CA, proudly announces the launch of Kohl Building Maintenance’s new mobile responsive website http://www.KohlBM.com . KBM is excited to introduce its new user-friendly site with easily accessible contact forms on virtually every page. The intuitive layout is designed for easy navigation and smooth user experience for its potential clients in need of industry leading professional building maintenance.
“Kohl Building Maintenance is a strong established business in the Southern California market," stated Richard Uzelac, CEO of GoMarketing. "The old site did not convey their professionalism, commitment and excellence, we believe this new site shows the true picture of how wonderful KBM truly is.”
The various pages are optimized to provide useful information to clients looking for services offered by KBM and who would like learn more about the company. To highlight KBM’s experience, the new site proudly displays an overview of the company’s previous work in various fields of building maintenance.
The new website is responsive and automatically adapts to best fit the screen sizes of multiple platforms including desktops, tablets and smart phones.
The consistent presence of contact forms and suggestion form on the website are a reflection of KBM’s commitment to customer service. The instant access to feedback allows better connection between KBM and their clients.
About Kohl Building Maintenance
KBM has serviced the comprehensive maintenance needs of Los Angeles area companies since 1974. Their mission is to provide cost saving solutions to our clients maintenance needs. This is accomplished by understanding, analyzing and evaluating their specific maintenance requirements and financial objectives and customizing their services to accommodate those needs.
KBM has provided maintenance services to a wide range of buildings and users, including Office, Medical, Industrial, R & D, Government, Retail, Schools and Automobile Dealerships. They are also very active in construction clean up and detail work, and have been instrumental in establishing and implementing immediate and long term maintenance programs for their clients to ensure the cleanliness of their working environment, which ultimately effects employee productivity and happiness.
For more information contact KBM at http://www.KohlBM.com or call 818.882.2600.
About GoMarketing
Over the past nine years, GoMarketing has constantly endeavored to understand the Internet marketing landscapes as it changes practically daily. They offer Online Advertising, Internet Optimization, Social Media Optimization, E-Commerce solutions, Software Design and Development, Website Design and Development, and a host of services to provide our Clients with the best programs to meet their goals.
For more information about GoMarketing visit http://www.GoMarketing.com or call 866.736.1232.
